title: OSKY CHATBOT
subtitle: Intelligent Virtual Assistant for Festivals
description: Osky Chatbot is an intelligent virtual assistant designed to enhance the user experience at festivals. Using Natural Language Processing (NLP), it provides accurate answers to questions about artists, tickets, and transportation.
features: Natural Language Processing (NLP) for understanding user queries
Accurate information about artists, tickets, and transportation
Scalable architecture to handle high traffic during festivals

title: VIRTUAL CATALOG
subtitle: Interactive Digital Catalog for Businesses
description: Virtual Catalog is designed for managing students, courses, and professors in a Faculty of Computer Science. It is currently a work in progress, with exciting features on the way!
features: Student Management: View, add, and delete students
Course & Professor Management: Organize academic courses and faculty
Database Integration: Uses PostgreSQL for efficient data storage
Simple & Interactive Frontend: Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

title: C# CALCULATOR
subtitle: Simple and Efficient Calculator Application
description: Windows Calculator - developed in WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation) using C#. The calculator has two main modes: Standard and Programmer, and it is still under development
features: Basic arithmetic operations (addition, subtraction, multiplication, division)
Advanced functions: square root, square, reciprocal, percentage, sign change
Memory: store, add, subtract, recall, and view memory stack
Conversions between number bases: HEX, DEC, OCT, BIN
Bitwise operations: AND, OR, XOR, NOT, bit shifting
